item.text: Then the high priest said, “Are these things true?”

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> he <st data-num="5346" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="80">Brothers</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">fathers</st>, <st data-num="191" class="">listen</st> to me. The <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> of <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> <st data-num="3708">appeared</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">forefather</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="11" class="">Abraham</st> when he <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3318" class="">Mesopotamia</st>, <st data-num="4250" class="">before</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="2730" class="">settled</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5488" class="">Haran</st>,
and said to him, ‘Go out from your country and from your relatives, and come to the land I will show you.’

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="1831">went out</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">country</st> of the <st data-num="5466" class="">Chaldeans</st> and <st data-num="2730" class="">settled</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5488" class="">Haran</st>. <st data-num="3326" class="">After</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> <st data-num="599" class="">died</st>, God<n id="1" /> made <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3351" class="">move</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">country</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">where</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> <st data-num="2730" class="">live</st>.

He did not give any of it to him for an inheritance, not even a foot of ground, yet God promised to give it to him as his possession, and to his descendants after him, even though Abraham as yet had no child.
But God spoke as follows: ‘Your descendants will be foreigners in a foreign country, whose citizens will enslave them and mistreat them for 400 years.
But I will punish the nation they serve as slaves,’ said God, ‘and after these things they will come out of there and worship me in this place.’

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> God<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Abraham</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="1242" class="">covenant</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="4061" class="">circumcision</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> he <st data-num="1080" class="">became the father</st> of <st data-num="2464" class="">Isaac</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4059" class="">circumcised</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> when he was <st data-num="3590" class="">eight</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> old,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2464" class="">Isaac</st> became the father of<n id="5" /> <st data-num="2384" class="">Jacob</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2384" class="">Jacob</st> of the <st data-num="1427" class="">twelve</st> <st data-num="3966" class="">patriarchs</st>.<n id="6" />

The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3966" class="">patriarchs</st>, because they were <st data-num="2206" class="">jealous</st> of <st data-num="2501" class="">Joseph</st>, <st data-num="591" class="">sold</st><n id="2" /> him <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="125" class="">Egypt</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1807" class="">rescued</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3956">all</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2347" class="">troubles</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">granted</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">favor</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st> <st data-num="1726" class="">in the presence of</st> <st data-num="5328" class="">Pharaoh</st>, <st data-num="935" class="">king</st> <st data-num="1726" class="">of</st> <st data-num="125" class="">Egypt</st>, who <st data-num="2525" class="">made</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2233" class="">ruler</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">over</st> <st data-num="125" class="">Egypt</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">over</st> <st data-num="3650" class="">all</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">household</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st> a <st data-num="3042" class="">famine</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">occurred</st> <st data-num="1909 3650">throughout</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="125" class="">Egypt</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5477" class="">Canaan</st>, causing<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="2347" class="">suffering</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3962" class="">ancestors</st><n id="4" /> could <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> <st data-num="5527" class="">food</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> when <st data-num="2384" class="">Jacob</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> that there <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4621" class="">grain</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="125" class="">Egypt</st>, he <st data-num="1821" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">ancestors</st><n id="2" /> there<n id="3" /> the <st data-num="4413">first</st> time.

<st data-num="1722" class="">On</st> their <st data-num="1208" class="">second</st> visit <st data-num="2501" class="">Joseph</st> <st data-num="319">made</st> himself <st data-num="319">known</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st> again, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2501">Joseph’s</st> <st data-num="1085" class="">family</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1096" class="">became</st> <st data-num="5318" class="">known</st> to <st data-num="5328" class="">Pharaoh</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> <st data-num="2501" class="">Joseph</st> <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> a message<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="3333" class="">invited</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> <st data-num="2384" class="">Jacob</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> his <st data-num="4772" class="">relatives</st> to come, <st data-num="1440" class="">seventy</st>-<st data-num="4002">five</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">people</st><n id="3" /> in <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> <st data-num="2384" class="">Jacob</st> <st data-num="2597">went down</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="125" class="">Egypt</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5053" class="">died</st> there,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532">along with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">ancestors</st>,<n id="2" />
and their bones were later moved to Shechem and placed in the tomb that Abraham had bought for a certain sum of money from the sons of Hamor in Shechem.
“But as the time drew near for God to fulfill the promise he had declared to Abraham, the people increased greatly in number in Egypt,
until another king who did not know about Joseph ruled over Egypt.

<st data-num="3778" class="">This</st> was the one who <st data-num="2686" class="">exploited</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="1085" class="">people</st><n id="2" /> and was <st data-num="2559" class="">cruel</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">ancestors</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4160" class="">forcing</st> them to <st data-num="1570" class="">abandon</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="1025" class="">infants</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">so</st> they would <st data-num="3361 2225">die</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="1722" class="">At</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2540" class="">time</st> <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1080" class="">born</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="791" class="">beautiful</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>. For<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="3376" class="">months</st> <st data-num="3739">he</st> was <st data-num="397" class="">brought up</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> his <st data-num="3962">father’s</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st>,

<st data-num="1161">and</st> when <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> had been <st data-num="1620" class="">abandoned</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5328">Pharaoh’s</st> <st data-num="2364" class="">daughter</st> <st data-num="337" class="">adopted</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="397" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="397" class="">up</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">as</st> <st data-num="1438">her own</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st> was <st data-num="3811" class="">trained</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st> of the <st data-num="124" class="">Egyptians</st> <st data-num="1161">and</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1415" class="">powerful</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">words</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">when</st> he was <st data-num="4137" class="">about</st> <st data-num="5063" class="">forty</st> <st data-num="5550">years old</st>, it <st data-num="305" class="">entered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">mind</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="1980" class="">visit</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="80">fellow countrymen</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="5207 2474">Israelites</st>.<n id="3" />

When<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">one of them</st> being <st data-num="91">hurt unfairly</st>,<n id="2" /> Moses<n id="3" /> <st data-num="292">came to his defense</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1557" class="">avenged</st> the person who was <st data-num="2669" class="">mistreated</st> by <st data-num="3960" class="">striking down</st> the <st data-num="124" class="">Egyptian</st>.

He <st data-num="3543" class="">thought</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="80">own people</st><n id="1" /> would <st data-num="4920" class="">understand</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> was <st data-num="1325 4991">delivering</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="5495 846">him</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> they did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4920" class="">understand</st>.<n id="4" />

The <st data-num="1966" class="">next</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> Moses<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3708" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">two men</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3164" class="">fighting</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4900">tried to make</st> <st data-num="1515" class="">peace</st> between<n id="3" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, ‘<st data-num="435" class="">Men</st>, you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brothers;</st> <st data-num="2444" class="">why</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> you <st data-num="91" class="">hurting</st> <st data-num="240">one another</st>?’
But the man who was unfairly hurting his neighbor pushed Moses aside, saying, ‘Who made you a ruler and judge over us?
You don’t want to kill me the way you killed the Egyptian yesterday, do you?’
When the man said this, Moses fled and became a foreigner in the land of Midian, where he became the father of two sons.
“After forty years had passed, an angel appeared to him in the desert of Mount Sinai, in the flame of a burning bush.

When <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> it, he was <st data-num="2296" class="">amazed</st> at the <st data-num="3705" class="">sight</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> when <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="4334" class="">approached</st> to <st data-num="2657" class="">investigate</st>, there <st data-num="1096" class="">came</st> the <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>,
‘I am the God of your forefathers, the God of Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob.’ Moses began to tremble and did not dare to look more closely.
But the Lord said to him, ‘Take the sandals off your feet, for the place where you are standing is holy ground.
I have certainly seen the suffering of my people who are in Egypt and have heard their groaning, and I have come down to rescue them. Now come, I will send you to Egypt.’
This same Moses they had rejected, saying, ‘Who made you a ruler and judge?’ God sent as both ruler and deliverer through the hand of the angel who appeared to him in the bush.

<st data-num="3778">This man</st> <st data-num="1806" class="">led</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1806" class="">out</st>, <st data-num="4160" class="">performing</st> <st data-num="5059" class="">wonders</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4592" class="">miraculous signs</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="1093">land</st> of <st data-num="125">Egypt</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="2063" class="">Red</st> <st data-num="2281" class="">Sea</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2048" class="">wilderness</st><n id="4" /> for <st data-num="5062" class="">forty</st> <st data-num="2094" class="">years</st>.
This is the Moses who said to the Israelites, ‘God will raise up for you a prophet like me from among your brothers.’

<st data-num="3778" class="">This</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the man who <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">congregation</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2048" class="">wilderness</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> who <st data-num="2980" class="">spoke</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> <st data-num="3735" class="">Mount</st> <st data-num="4614" class="">Sinai</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> with <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">ancestors</st>,<n id="3" /> and <st data-num="3739">he</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1209" class="">received</st> <st data-num="2198" class="">living</st> <st data-num="3051" class="">oracles</st><n id="5" /> to <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.<n id="6" />

<st data-num="1473" class="">Our</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3962" class="">ancestors</st><n id="2" /> were <st data-num="3756 2309">unwilling</st> to <st data-num="1096" class="">obey</st><n id="3" /> him, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="683" class="">pushed</st> him <st data-num="683" class="">aside</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4762" class="">turned back</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="125" class="">Egypt</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st>,
saying to Aaron, ‘Make us gods who will go in front of us, for this Moses, who led us out of the land of Egypt —we do not know what has happened to him!’

<st data-num="1722" class="">At</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">time</st><n id="2" /> they <st data-num="3447">made an idol in the form of a calf</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="321" class="">brought</st><n id="4" /> a <st data-num="2378" class="">sacrifice</st> to the <st data-num="1497" class="">idol</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> began <st data-num="2165" class="">rejoicing</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2041" class="">works</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st>.<n id="6" />

But God turned away from them and gave them over to worship the host of heaven, as it is written in the book of the prophets: ‘It was not to me that you offered slain animals and sacrifices forty years in the wilderness, was it, house of Israel?
But you took along the tabernacle of Moloch and the star of the god Rephan, the images you made to worship, but I will deport you beyond Babylon.’

<st data-num="1473" class="">Our</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">ancestors</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">had</st> the <st data-num="4633" class="">tabernacle</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="3142" class="">testimony</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2048" class="">wilderness</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2531">just as</st> God<n id="4" /> who <st data-num="2980" class="">spoke</st> to <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st> <st data-num="1299" class="">ordered</st> him<n id="5" /> to <st data-num="4160" class="">make</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> the <st data-num="5179" class="">design</st> he had <st data-num="3708" class="">seen</st>.

<st data-num="1473" class="">Our</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3962" class="">ancestors</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1237">received possession</st> of it and <st data-num="1521" class="">brought</st> it <st data-num="1521" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Joshua</st> <st data-num="1722">when</st> they <st data-num="2697" class="">dispossessed</st> the <st data-num="1484" class="">nations</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1856" class="">drove out</st> <st data-num="575 4383">before</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">ancestors</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">time</st><n id="4" /> of <st data-num="1138" class="">David</st>.

<st data-num="3739">He</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">favor</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1799">with</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="154" class="">asked</st> that he could<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> a <st data-num="4638">dwelling place</st><n id="5" /> for the <st data-num="3624">house</st><n id="6" /> of <st data-num="2384" class="">Jacob</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4672" class="">Solomon</st> <st data-num="3618" class="">built</st> a <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st><n id="1" /> for <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.
Yet the Most High does not live in houses made by human hands, as the prophet says,

‘Heaven is my throne,

and earth is the footstool for my feet.

What kind of house will you build for me, says the Lord,

or what is my resting place?
Did my hand not make all these things?’
“You stubborn people, with uncircumcised hearts and ears! You are always resisting the Holy Spirit, like your ancestors did!

<st data-num="5101" class="">Which</st> of the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st> did <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">ancestors</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1377" class="">persecute</st>?<n id="2" /> They<n id="3" /> <st data-num="615" class="">killed</st> those who <st data-num="4293" class="">foretold long ago</st> the <st data-num="1660" class="">coming</st> of the <st data-num="1342" class="">Righteous One</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">whose</st> <st data-num="4273" class="">betrayers</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5406" class="">murderers</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> have <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">become</st>!<n id="5" />
You received the law by decrees given by angels, but you did not obey it.”
When they heard these things, they became furious and ground their teeth at him.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> Stephen,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4134" class="">full</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>, <st data-num="816">looked intently</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">toward</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">standing</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="1188" class="">right hand</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

“<st data-num="2400">Look</st>!” he <st data-num="3004">said</st>.<n id="1" /> “I <st data-num="2334" class="">see</st> the <st data-num="3772" class="">heavens</st> <st data-num="1272" class="">opened</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">standing</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="1188">right hand</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>!”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> they <st data-num="4912" class="">covered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3775" class="">ears</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2896">shouting out</st> with a <st data-num="3173" class="">loud</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3729" class="">rushed</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">at</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3661">with one intent</st>.

When<n id="1" /> they had <st data-num="1544" class="">driven</st> him <st data-num="1854">out of</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st>, they began to <st data-num="3036" class="">stone</st> him,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3144" class="">witnesses</st> <st data-num="659" class="">laid</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">cloaks</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3844" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st> of a <st data-num="3494">young man</st> <st data-num="2564" class="">named</st> <st data-num="4569" class="">Saul</st>.

They<n id="1" /> continued to <st data-num="3036" class="">stone</st> <st data-num="4736" class="">Stephen</st> while he <st data-num="1941" class="">prayed</st>, “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, <st data-num="1209" class="">receive</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st>!”

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="5087" class="">fell</st><n id="1" /> to his <st data-num="1119" class="">knees</st> and <st data-num="2896">cried out</st> with a <st data-num="3173" class="">loud</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st>, “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">hold</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> against <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>!”<n id="2" /> When<n id="3" /> he had <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, he <st data-num="2837" class="">died</st>.<n id="4" />
